channel.title: [req]gold dragon set[req]
channel.description: Hi im very looking for full dragon recouloured gold please please please im begging anyone to make for meh i would really appreciate it if it came with the int and the model tyvm

item.title: [req]gold dragon set[req]
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

lin if he cant even find his ints i doubt he’d know how to itemdump, tbh, i never did it b4 and i currently like to know how unless im correct in saying its through a 525 cache and you’d simple dump the item file for the item you found in the cache suite or w.e.

and yeah i knew something was wrong with the colours, i wasn’t using colour wheel = i didnt get correct colour code

Read full topic

item.title: [req]gold dragon set[req]
item.dc:creator: @Seerofdeath Seerofdeath
item.description:
@Seerofdeath wrote:

[quote=“the1337legend, post:7, topic:289525”]mmmm i nvr recoloured through the ints but i beleve this is yellow also

add this in the ints for the dragon full helm, class8 file in your client search ctrl+f, “dragon full” and in any part after it says if(itemid=7611) or w.e add

        class8.anIntArray160[0] = 255;
        class8.anIntArray160[1] = 249;

i probably did that wrong, if its not yellow, delete it and wait for someone else.[/quote]

i used like err 7000 for my gold dragon stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: [req]gold dragon set[req]
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Why would you need the model? Just get an item dump, copy the dragon items, and color them yellow… All the dragon items are the same color, so it shouldn’t be hard.

Read full topic
